resources.string: "Eating healthy food is the simplest way to shed excess weight and become healthy and slim forever." \ n (Subodh Gupta)
"The doctor of the future will no longer treat human beings with medicine; he will cure and prevent diseases with nutrition." \n (Thomas Edison)
If you liked our application, we invite you to share it with your friends or family. It would be great if you help us reach more people.
To get in touch with us please complete the following form.

Hello everyone, my name is Deyson Vente, I am currently a Software Development student and I am the one who has developed this application. For me it is a pleasure to be able to share with you a little of what I have been learning, I am still in the beginner phase and my purpose is to become a professional in this field. \n I have been developing this application thanks to various sources of information and training that I have visited. I have resorted to the use of libraries and plugins that Google provides for its community.
